name: profmk
description: Compact promise pattern implementation and more.
author: Mathieu MAST

scripts.pretest: cp profmk.js test/profmk.js; cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js test/ext/require.js; cp node_modules/mocha/mocha.js test/ext/mocha.js; cp node_modules/mocha/mocha.css test/ext/mocha.css; cp node_modules/chai/chai.js test/ext/chai.js

win32.pretest: copy profmk.js test/profmk.js; cp node_modules/requirejs/require.js test/ext/require.js; cp node_modules/mocha/mocha.js test/ext/mocha.js; cp node_modules/mocha/mocha.css test/ext/mocha.css; cp node_modules/chai/chai.js test/ext/chai.js
